oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Pionus Breeders Association Sets Up Studbook
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: n/a, n/a
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The Pionus Breeders Association has justset up a Stud Book for each of the Pionusspecies. This is being done to enablebreeders to know where their breedingstock came from and to make sure that weare keeping a clean gene pool. Some of thePion us species are in great need of protectionin the wild and further we need tohave captive breeding populations set upnow. Toward that end we are, at this time,asking all owners of the Pion us species toplease answer the following questionsabout their bird or birds and forward thatinformation to The Pionus BreedersAssociation for tabulation . It is only a matterof time before all bird species are in direneed of captive breeding programs due tothe loss of rain forest in the home countriesof each species.
